org.araneaframework.uilib.list.structure.filter
Class BaseFilterHelper

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.uilib.list.structure.filter.BaseFilterHelper
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, ListContext, FilterContext
Direct Known Subclasses:
FieldFilterHelper, FilterHelper
public abstract class BaseFilterHelper
extends Object
implements FilterContext, Serializable

Base implementation of list filter helper. Filter helper is used to add filters and their form elements to the ListWidget.

This class handles configuration for new filter such as strictness (e.g equal is not allowed for greater than filter) as well as allow to predefine custom labels for fields that are not added to the standard list of list fields but are used in filter form elements instead.

The handling of field types and their comparator is proxied to TypeHelper of the list widget.

Author:
Rein Raudj√§rv
See Also:
ListWidget, FilterHelper, TypeHelper, Serialized Form

_addCustomLabel

protected void _addCustomLabel(String fieldId,
                               String labelId)
Adds custom label for specified field. This can override already defined label of list field. Those labels are used by new filter form elements that are automatically created for list filters.

Parameters:
fieldId - field id.
labelId - label id (not yet resolved).

getFieldLabel

public String getFieldLabel(String fieldId)
Retrieves label for the specified field. If there are now custom label defined, one is retrieved from list fields defined in ListWidget.

Range filter's low and high labels are automatically generated based on the original field itself.

Specified by:
getFieldLabel in interface ListContext
Parameters:
fieldId - field id.
Returns:
the label of this field.

getFieldType

public Class getFieldType(String fieldId)
Retrieves type for the specified field.

If type is not defined for range filter's low/high value, the range filter field type is returned.

Otherwise TypeHelper.getFieldType(String) is just called.

Specified by:
getFieldType in interface ListContext
Parameters:
fieldId - field id.
Returns:
the type of this field.
See Also:
TypeHelper.getFieldType(String)

getLowValueId

public String getLowValueId(String fieldId)
Transform the field id into range filter's low value id.

The LOW_SUFFIX is appended to the field id.
